biotools.summary: MitoBank is a simple perl script to obtain from GeneBank mitochondrial genomes, parse them, and store the different genes in separate files. It can be used to retrieve both coding genes and RNA genes. Coding genes might be obtained in their amino acid or nucleotide sequence.

bioschemas.name: MitoBank
